model_input:
[Task Description]
You will be given DIALOGUE CONTEXT and MEMORY.
Your job is to judge if MEMORY contains helpful past information for a language model, representing Unknown, to generate a proper next response based on DIALOGUE CONTEXT.

If the DIALOUGE CONTEXT does not require the model to utilize past information for response generation, say "N/A".
Say "Yes" if MEMORY contains such helpful information and say "No" if it dose not.
Provide a brief explanation for your judgement.

[Format Regulation]
Generate your output below OUTPUT using the following format:
Brief explanation: your explanation
Judgement: "Yes", "No", or "N/A"

[Task]
DIALOGUE CONTEXT:
I loaded up on repellent like you said and I also grabbed a few of those mosquito repellent bracelets, I figured why not!
Have you been hiking lately?
Yes I did actually. I lead some friends on a hike in a local trail last weekend. They got tired really quickly as they never go hiking they told me.
Sounds like me. I am not a fan of the outdoors. Did your friends manage to have a good time anyway?
Oh they did. We had some nice snacks along the way. Oddly enough, we had some trail mix that someone had made at home. It was quite tasty. We also had some juice and water packed to make sure everyone stayed hydrated. You should join us one day! I'll make it as fun as possible.
I will someday. just not in the summer when all the bugs are out! Where do you go hiking the most?
I like to go hiking in the local trails here. I am familiar with them and there's so many routes that I can take. Sadly, the bugs are as bad here as they are anywhere else.....
They can't be that bad in the fall right? I hope? Do you camp most every weekend?
A least a couple of times a month. Sometimes, yeah, I go every weekend to relax. Being in nature is so relaxing to me. And nah the bugs aren't too bad in the fall and winter. There's a beautiful river along one trail that I bet you'd love to see.

[MEMORY]
Related Evidences: (1) {'Related Topics': 'Outdoor Activities', 'Related Summaries': 'Speaker A loves camping in the woods and hiking, while Speaker B enjoys being outdoors for the fresh air but dislikes mud and rain.', 'Related Dialogues': '### Speaker A: Yes, I'm hoping to get a few in this summer while it's nice and warm. Considering a cruise instead next year for something different. ### Speaker B: Ah that sounds nice, I reckon you'll love cruises too. I've not been camping for a long time, I love been out in the outdoors ### Speaker A: I enjoy looking for wild animals in the woods. It's fascinating to see them in their natural habitat instead of in cages like at the zoo.' }
```
